description:
Icerberg Legends is the NFT powered by TanglePay and the Tangle Rally.

Reward level: Hero, a reward level of 3-5. Elite, a reward level of 4-8. Epic, a reward level of 7-15. 
Any 3 Iceberg can be added up to become the Legendary with a 20% reward level bonus. 
There is a Hidden Legend with higher airdrop reward level.

This batch contains nine legends, Ashe, Yun, Naga, Shogun, Akako, Karl, Alister, Athena and Hanuman (1.41%).

More information: https://nft.tanglepay.com
name: TanglePay Iceberg Legends (Epic) Tier3
